Uses of Class
com.noctarius.tengi.core.config.ConfigurationBuilder

  • Packages that use ConfigurationBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.noctarius.tengi.core.config
    The config package contains the configuration interfaces and a ConfigurationBuilder for creating immutable configuration that can easily be shared between threads.

    • Uses of ConfigurationBuilder in com.noctarius.tengi.core.config

      Methods in com.noctarius.tengi.core.config that return ConfigurationBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <O,I> ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.addMarshaller(MarshallerFilter marshallerFilter, I marshallerId, MarshallerReader<O> reader, MarshallerWriter<O> writer)
      Configures a new Marshaller and a corresponding MarshallerFilter to be injected into the internal serializer framework.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.addMarshaller(MarshallerFilter marshallerFilter, Marshaller marshaller)
      Configures a new Marshaller and a corresponding MarshallerFilter to be injected into the internal serializer framework.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.addTransport(Transport... transports)
      Adds one or more Transports to the possible transports.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.addTransport(Transport transport)
      Adds a Transport to the possible transports.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.handshakeHandler(HandshakeHandler handshakeHandler)
      Defines the HandshakeHandler instance to verify, accept or deny new connection handshakes.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.ssl(boolean sslEnabled)
      Defines if the Transports should use SSL.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.transportPort(Transport transport, int port)
      Configures an explicit mapping of a port (for example TCP or UDP) to the given Transport.
